name: .OLS File Extension
summary: Learn about .OLS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use an OLS file to add a recipient list to a Publisher mail or email merge, select Mailings → Select Recipients → Use Existing List. Publisher will show you a list of your existing OLS files, from which you can select.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
